title: How New Yearâ€™s Was Spent
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Wow! Kotori, your outfit is adorable!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Thank you. ğ…  Itâ€™s a new sweater I bought for the new year. ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I see. That dusty pink cable knit sweater suits you quite well. ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe. Thanks, but youâ€™re making me blush. Mari-san, where did you go for New Yearâ€™s?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I went on vacation to Okinawa.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>That sounds nice. What did you do during your time there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>There were a lot of people swimming on the beach or going shopping, but I think I spent most of my time doing nothing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Huh, you were doing nothing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes! Taking it easy is a way to spend a vacation. Speaking of which, hereâ€™s a souvenir ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Wow, this is so cute~ ğ…  A bracelet with coral charms! Mari-san, thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
